description: You are in a dark room. You are angry.

directionExits.description: A hallway. You can hear the voices of two men talking.

smackExits.description: You smack the wall with your fist. The wall cowers at your might.

description: You are in a dark room. You are angry, but less so now.

directionExits.description: A hallway. You can hear one of the jailers trying to wake up the other.

smackExits.description: You smack the wall with your fist. The wall cowers at your might.

description: You are standing in a hallway, two men see you and yell at you to go back to your cell. They approach rapidly.

directionExits.outcomeText: You run back into your cell, the men stop chasing you.
You attempt to run past the two jailers. They grab you and drag you back to your cell.

smackExits.description: You smack one of the jailers with a baseball bat. He appears to be knocked out.
You swing your fists wildly, but the jailers outnumber you. They bonk you on the head and drag you back to your cell.

description: The other jailer is in shock, after all, you broke a baseball bat on his coworker's head.

directionExits.outcomeText: You run back into your cell, the man stops chasing you.

You are able to run past the guard, who is still in shock. You exit out the hallway.
As you leave the hallway, you hit the door closing button, and the hallway seals and locks behind you.

smackExits.description:
You smack the second guard with your fist. He staggers back and you are able to run past him and exit out the hallway.
As you leave the hallway, you hit the door closing button, and the hallway seals and locks behind you.

description:
You come out into what appears to be a cafeteria.
You see various alien prisoners chained to their tables eating food.
To your right is a fire alarm.

smackExits.description: You smack the red fire alarm button. In an instant, nozzles come down from the ceiling and spray water. The prisoner's chains to their tables are unlocked.

description:
The aliens, now freed from their chains, proceed to start a riot. They are clashing with the guards in the Cafeteria head on.
You decide to use the chaos to escape the station.

directionExits.description: The door exiting the cafeteria. There is a guard standing in the way, barking orders desperately.
directionExits.outcomeText: You move quickly towards the exit of the cafeteria

smackExits.description: You smack the fire alarm button again, for good measure.

description: The cafeteria door is blocked by a guard, he yells at you amid the chaos to return to your cell peacefully under threat of execution.

directionExits.outcomeText:
You ignore his command and start to take a step. He raises his raygun and commands you to step back.
You decide to follow his orders.

smackExits.description:
You quickly point the raygun at the guard and pull the trigger. It does not shoot. In anger, you smack the gun.
The gun's plasma circuit starts to overload, with panicked surprise, you throw the gun at the guard.
The raygun collides with the guard, he and the gun implode into a micro singularity.
You head through the now unimpeded door.

You ignore his command and wind up a haymaker. Just as he raises his raygun to shoot you, he is abruptly and violently flattened by a massive alien.
You decide to not stick around and thank your saviour.

description: You exit the cafeteria into a long hallway with escape pods on the Western wall. Alarms are blaring.

directionExits.description: An office door. The door is ajar.
directionExits.outcomeText: You saunter through the office door.
You head over to the escape pod.

smackExits.description: Overcome with an intense urge to smack something, you hurt yourself in your confusion.

description:
You enter into an impressive looking office, there is a desk with a computer open. You quickly search for things useful to escape.
While you are searching, the door behind you slams closed.
Over the intercom you hear a robotic voice.
"EMERGENCY LOCKDOWN ACTIVATED, STAY WHERE YOU ARE"

directionExits.description: The now-closed door to the office
directionExits.outcomeText: You attempt to walk through the locked door, it is indeed locked down, and physics stops you from passing through.

smackExits.description:
In anger, you smack the keyboard on the desk.
By a chimp-on-a-typewriter type miracle, you entered the password to lift the lockdown.

You wedge your crowbar under the door.
With all your might, you manage to pry a small opening in the door that you can fit through.
On the other side a guard witnesses you.
You throw the crowbar like a boomerang.
It misses the guard, but flies past him and hits the emergency airlock button.
The guard is sucked out into the unforgiving void of space.

description: The door to the office opens, and in rushes a visibly distraught guard. He yells at you to freeze.

smackExits.description:
Once again, you smack the keyboard.
"EMERGENCY LOCKDOWN ACTIVATED"
Quite gruesomely, the guard is pancaked from the force of the closing door.
You lift the lockdown, and proceed out the office door.

description: You are back into the escape pods hallway. The alarms are still blaring.

directionExits.outcomeText: You walk back into the office.
You head over to the escape pod.

smackExits.description: Overcome with an intense urge to smack something, you hurt yourself in your confusion.

description: You enter into an impressive looking office, there is a desk with a computer open.

directionExits.description: The open door to the office
directionExits.outcomeText: You walk back to the escape pods.

smackExits.description:
You smack the keyboard once again.
"INVALID PASSWORD"

description: You see an escape pod, the door to entry is locked. There is a keycard scanner to the right of the door.

directionExits.outcomeText: You walk away from the escape pod door.

smackExits.description:
You smack the keycard reader.
"KEYCARD IS NOT IN THE AUTHORIZED USER FILE, THIS INCIDENT WILL BE REPORTED"
How rude.

description: You see an escape pod, the door to entry is locked. There is a keycard scanner to the right of the door.

directionExits.outcomeText: You walk away from the escape pod door.

smackExits.description:
You smack the keycard reader.
"KEYCARD IS NOT IN THE AUTHORIZED USER FILE, THIS INCIDENT WILL BE REPORTED"
How rude.

You swipe the keycard in the keycard reader.
"READING KEYCARD, PLEASE WAIT"
.
..
...
....
You smack the keycard reader.
"ACCESS GRANTED, HAVE A SAFE FLIGHT"

description:
You enter into the escape pod, shut the door, and blast off.
You have successfully escaped from intergalatic prison.
In your closing thoughts, you remark how lax the security was to be containing as many dangerous aliens as it had.
